meanings: sad, mournful, (literary) sorrowful, (literary) grieved, (표정 등이) doleful, (소리 등이) plaintive

examples.korean: We are very sad to hear that you are leaving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (당신이) 떠나신다는 소식을 듣게 되어 저흰 정말 슬퍼요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I’ve been so sad ever since my grandfather passed away. I’ve been crying nonstop. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 할아버지가 돌아가신 후로 줄곧 정말 슬퍼. 쉬지 않고 계속 울고 있어. DARAKWON
